landing-description: Onboarding migrants in the local financial system.

wizard.step-1: This wizard will take you through a short process of collecting all required data. Once you have scanned, uploaded, or filled everything, you will be redirected to the dashboard. There you will be able to fill documents for a new bank account, learn or interact with a rich community. Good luck.
wizard.step-2: Please scan your ID document (personal ID, if the host country has issued you one, or an international passport)
wizard.step-3: Check and fix any missing or erroneous data.
wizard.step-4: Scan or attach any additional documents you have.
wizard.step-5: Take a picture of yourself. Make sure you are clearly recognizable.

banks.bank-tip: Tip: when you click APPLY the bank will receive a digital copy of your personal data and required documents. Once your application is active it will take up to 2 work days to process it. Take the time to browse our learn section.
banks.success: You successfully applied for a bank account. Expect results in the next 2 business days.
